name: PoliceAcademy
0:
”Alexa, open police academy”
”You have the right to remain silent”
”Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: police academy
des: Have you always been a crime fighter at heart? Do you feel the need to protect the common good? Then the police academy is the place for you! Practice giving the miranda rights by repeating after Alexa, and you will be making the streets cleaner in no time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
